aboutModal.title: Multi-language Translation App
aboutModal.description: A translation app for people learning multiple languages simultaneously.
aboutModal.features:
‚Ä¢ 6 language support
‚Ä¢ Word/sentence translation
‚Ä¢ Ambiguous meaning display
‚Ä¢ Drag-and-drop sorting
‚Ä¢ Calendar-based history

feedbackModal.title: Feedback
feedbackModal.message:
If you have any opinions or suggestions for improvement, please let us know anytime!

We will provide a better multilingual learning experience.

rateModal.title: Rate App
rateModal.message: Has the app been helpful? Your rating would be a great help in providing better service.

privacyModal.title: Privacy Policy
privacyModal.message:
This app does not collect user personal information.

‚Ä¢ Search history is stored only on your device
‚Ä¢ Network connection is used only for translation
‚Ä¢ User data is not transmitted externally
‚Ä¢ All data is managed locally

featuresModal.title: Key Features
featuresModal.message:
‚Ä¢ Simultaneous multi-language translation
‚Ä¢ Word/sentence search type selection
‚Ä¢ Detailed ambiguous meaning display
‚Ä¢ Drag-and-drop language order change
‚Ä¢ Calendar-based favorites/history management
‚Ä¢ Voice playback and copy function
‚Ä¢ Offline storage function
